divs: Sighting DetailsI was getting on to Interstate 5 north bound and as soon as i was up to speedwith everone elce i noticed a bright light off to my left that was going over300 mph i saw it moving back and forth like a snake would,it was going nw towardsherwood.There is a hill it was heading for and it and about there witch is about 20 to25 miles away from me then it disappeared.I got off at the next exit witch is donald5Caurora exit and headed east going to aurora. Just before i hit town i saw ared light to my left north and as soon as i looked at it , it turned and shineda bright light at my truck and followed me for about a block, then the lightwent out and there was nothing there, by then i was realy freekedout.I was going to see a friend and was so shookup i was afraid to leaveMy mother has seen the one over aurora alot, she was doing a newspaper route outthere for years and saw it all the time and thought it was a govermenthelocopter but i herd no noise just my tires and engine.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Woodburn
This sighting has never been favorited.
